reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: The Zanzibar Legal Service Centre intends over the period under review to accomplish the following strategic aims and objectives: Quality and timely legal aid services to the indigent provided, public engagement in constitution and law making processes en hanced, comprehensive research publication and documentation undertaken, human rights of marginalised groups promoted and protected enhanced, demand driven civic and legal education of the general public enhanced and organizational development and sustaina bility strengthened.Therefore to accomplish the above strategic aims ZLSC will strive to achieve the following outputs: Standard legal aid services for poor and marginalised people provided, paralegals aid services strengthened, community participation in constitution and law making process enhanced, advocacy for legal reform and good governance undertaken, action research that informs advocacy undertaken, user friendly resource centre strengthened, rights of women children the elderly people with disabilit y and people living with HIV/AIDS promoted and protected, human rights awareness and monitoring in Zanzibar enhanced, capacity of CSO's addressing the rights of poor marginalised and vulnerable groups strengthened, civic and voter literacy of the general p ublic in Zanzibar improved, knoeledge and skills of secondary school teachers on civics and legal education improved.
